textlist



class TextList;
A text list contains all text lumps found in a WAD file. It concatenates existing ones when they are added. No regard is taken for text file encoding, they are simply treated as arrays of bytes.

void readFrom(WAD wad);
Adds text lumps found in a WAD file to this list. If a text lump already exists, it will be extended with the text of the new lump.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to add text lumps from.

void addTo(WAD wad);
Adds the text lumps from this list to a WAD file.

Params:
WAD wad The WAD file to add the text lumps to.

void sort();
Sorts the text lumps in this list.
